Question
========

What is the correct description of an adjusted mean ("adjusted mean") in an ANCOVA? 
Answerlist
----------
* A mean on the covariate corrected for the influence of a factor.
* A mean on the covariate corrected for the influence of a lurking variable.
* A group mean adjusted for the influence of a covariate.
* A group mean adjusted for the influence of a lurking variable.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
